title: About me
text:
I only believe in information that is backed by concrete research evidence and sound journalism.
If someone tells me about a fact, I will check Google Scholar/Research Gate for a credible research paper, then check the references of that research paper until I read the original research.
After living in the heart of Europe for more than 1 year, I have become very mindful of my consumption habits as they impact the environment, and I am now a minimalist.
My greatest achievement so far: the strong bond I have with my family members.

title: Trieu Le
text:
Hi! This is Triều. Thanks for stopping by!
I am doing a Master’s in International Business Economics and Management at KU Leuven, Belgium.
The number one skill that I want to learn at the moment is communicating effectively with people: being to-the-point, specific, understandable, concise, articulate and polite without “and” or uhm”.
For me, every encounter is a chance to share and to learn.
Feel free to be in touch with me!

title: Work experience
text:
My goal is to get exposed to as many technical and business roles as possible.
My resume

title: How I stay more productive
text:
I use SelfControl application to block my access to distracting websites such as Instagram, Tiktok and Facebook. The application is free, open-source and is really useful. Even if I restart your computer or delete the application, access to those sites will remain restricted until the designated time expires.
I use Bitwarden to store my password and to generate random passwords for random websites.
